sentences.en: Draping fabric over a mannequin, he cuts and he pins , giving form to his imagination.
sentences.cn: 他把布披挂在人体模型上,裁剪、固定 、 让脑海中的想象成形.

sentences.en: It had a mannequin head and two fabric arms.
sentences.cn: 巴尼有个橱窗模特的脑袋和两只布料缝制的手臂.

sentences.en: It's illegal to change the clothes on a storefront mannequin unless you draw the shades first.
sentences.cn: 给前店的人体模特儿换衣服时必须有遮挡,否则违法.

sentences.en: Mannequin had the same physical characteristics as real human body.
sentences.cn: 人体模型与真实的生物人体具备相同的物理性能.

sentences.en: Mary seems interested in the dress on mannequin.
sentences.cn: 玛丽好像对模特身上穿的那件衣服很感兴趣.

sentences.en: Objective To vividly display the forming principle of anthropometric ECG by using mannequin.
sentences.cn: 目的:形象展示心电图的形成原理,利用人体模型更直接地展示心电图的形成过程.

sentences.en: Our company produce 100 % human hair, extension hair, hair extension tools, training head, and Mannequin head.
sentences.cn: 我们公司生产的100%人类头发, 延长头发, 头发延长工具, 培训主管, 和人体头部.

sentences.en: Results The forming principles of ECG from mannequin and real people were identical.
sentences.cn: 结果:人体模型产生心电图的原理与真实人体完全相同.

sentences.en: Soldiers search the debris pulling out the mannerquin mannequin victims.
sentences.cn: 士兵们在残骸堆中搜寻,拖出模型受害者.

sentences.en: Subjects reported that they felt as if they were feeling the touch on the mannequin.
sentences.cn: 受试者报告说,他们感觉好象是在抚摸着人体模型.

sentences.en: Taken into consideration this practical application, a novel method for parameterized mannequin modeling was proposed.
sentences.cn: 考虑到这一实际应用, 提出了一种参数化人体建模的新方法.

sentences.en: The mannequin seems like a real person.
sentences.cn: 这模特儿看上去像真人一样.

sentences.en: They were told to stab a mannequin, rob it of $ 20, then lie about the " crime. "
sentences.cn: 叫他们刺伤人体模型, 从中抢走20美元, 然后说谎来掩盖这次 “ 罪行 ”.

trans.tran_en: a model of the human body, used for showing clothes in shop windows
